sections.title: APPENDIX H : SCATTER PLOTS OF FINAL TEST RESULT S This appendix contains selected scatter plots of much of the data found i n appendix G . The data points in the scatter plots are labeled with abbreviations o f the organization names, as follows : BBN (BBN) GE (GE) GE-CM (GE and CMU ) HU (Hughes ) LSI (LSI ) MDC (MDESC) MITR (MITRE) NM-BR (NMSU and Brandeis) NYU (NYU) PMAX (Paramax ) PRC (PRC ) SRA (SRA) SRI (SRI) UM-CQ (UMBC and ConQuest) UMA (UMass) UMI (UMichigan ) USC (USC) Most of the scatter plots are taken from the All Templates Row in the summar y score report . The All Templates scores include severe penalties for missing an d spurious data. See the paper on evaluation metrics by N . Chinchor in Part I fo r further information . 0O w 0 0 0
